title: Kuttram purindhavan : The Guilty one
overview: The story follows Bhaskar (Pasupathy), a former government pharmacist whose attempt to help goes wrong when a child goes missing, plunging him into a complex case fraught with guilt, secrets, and moral ambiguity. Gowtham (Vidharth) is the investigating officer, while Esther (Lakshmi Priyaa Chandramouli) is the frantic mother of the missing child.[7][8]
